We really think the Hartford Times acts much better

Charles C. Burleigh

Unionist full issue 1833-08-08

Section: Item Display

We really think the Hartford Times acts much better, the part of a discreet friend to Col. Judson, in omitting his Circular, than does the Advertiser in publishing and requesting others to publish it.

Section: Featured Content

Commentary

A recognition by Charles Burleigh that Judson's circular does not present its author in a good light. History has sustained Burleigh's insight in this regard.

Transcription
We really think the Hartford Times acts much better, the part of a discreet friend to Col. Judson, in omitting his Circular, than does the Advertiser in publishing and requesting others to publish it.
Commentary
A recognition by Charles Burleigh that Judson's circular does not present its author in a good light. History has sustained Burleigh's insight in this regard.
